Name: Crazy Eights 3D Premium
About the game: Realistic 3D Crazy Eights simulation with singleplayer, multiplayer and tutorial. With configurable AI strength and many adjustable rule and game variants you can start exciting Crazy 8's games - or just play for fun. Crazy Eights is also known worldwide under the names Mau-Mau, One Card, Last Card, Switch, Taki and others . Compete with tricky computer opponents, or play relaxing rounds with friends or family in online mode ! Game environment, cards, rule variants and much more can be customized! For beginners, there is an animated tutorial in which Crazy Eights is explained step-by-step with all the rules. Features: Singleplayer mode with configurable opponent Many rule variations of Crazy 8's and Mau-Mau with up to 6 players Multiplayer mode with LAN or Online mode High Quality full animated 3D graphics Lots of tables, rooms and decks High-performance A.I. : different levels of difficulty Voice output and sound Highscore lists HD widescreen output Tutorial , detailed game instructions and help
